Gali
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Library: Fan Fiction, Poetry, Birthday List, Links & Non-Fiction Archive: Poetry: Gali
By GZA on Monday, January 19, 2004 - 07:19 pm:

Gali Gali
They shipped all of those monsters off to Cali Cali
To the African Nation of Mali Mali
They went the way of Mustang Sally Sally
Now all of them are gone no way to tally tally
I think they lost them all in the valley valley
Oh whatever happened to the Gali Gali
